title: PDFlex
description: PDFlex is an AI-powered tool that extracts and analyzes data from PDFs, allowing users to interact with documents through intelligent search and summarization features.

title: RentalX
description: RentalX is a property rental management platform that helps landlords and tenants streamline property listings, bookings, and payments with an intuitive and secure interface.

title: AI MedicalBot
description: AI MedicalBot is a chatbot that leverages AI to provide users with preliminary medical advice and health-related information, assisting in symptom analysis and suggesting possible next steps.
